summary: Toothpick is your new absolutely not immersive wooden follower.Complete with marriage option and flame cloak when entering combat, because that makes so much sense...
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~[b][u]What have you done?[/u][/b]~~~~~~ 
-A female mannequin 
-A follower 
-A possible marriage candidate 
-[b]And all of that at once![/b] 
-Gave it a more or less creative name 
-Gave it some wood ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) 

No matter what I say,someone is always inevitably going to ask,but... 

~~~~~~~[b][u]WHERE IS SHE?![/u][/b]~~~~~~~
-[b]Blue palace in Solitude,right when you enter[/b]!

~~~~~~~~What does she fight wifh?~~~~~~~~~ 
-If you couldn´t tell by all the pictures,she uses a bound bow and the arrows you give her. 
-She has no armor to start with,but hey,she´ll wear whatever you give her,like a real mannequin. 
Update 1.1 
-Making followers use spells is a pain, but yeah: Now she's using flame cloak whenever she engages combat

~~~~~~~~Are you going to add more to her?~~~~~~~~~ 
-If you come up with a good suggestion,maybe... 

~~~~~[u][b]A[/b]nyway-[b]A[/b]sked-[b]Q[/b]uestions(AAQ)[/u]~~~~~~ 
[i]Where can I find her?!?1?[/i] 
-Are you freaking serious...? 

[i]The marriage ceremony doesn´t start![/i] 
-Yes, I´ve had that problem when testing. [b]The ceremony will only start if she's not following you![/b]

[i]She used flame cloak,but it wasn´t very effective![/i] 
-That´s because that spell isn´t very effective in the first place

[i]Where is Rachel? Where is she?![/i] 
-Wrong mod,Batman...
author: McBook
